description: A zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskFinished is sent when the agent has detected
that the OTDR routine test task finished.

Summary.eval: ($v2 == 4) ? 'OTDR routine test task failed due to $v3' : 'OTDR routine test task status: $v2'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskFinished ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskCurrStartTime s EXAMPLEE ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskOperStatus i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskFailedReason i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskResultFile s EXAMPLE

description: The current routine test task start time.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskCurrStartTime

description: OTDR routine test task operational status.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskOperStatus

description: The OTDR routine test task failed reason.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskFailedReason

description: Routine test result file name.
NE returns file name such as 'taskname-20120505143302.zip' when
the routine test sucess.
NE returns empty string when the routine test failed.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrRoutineTaskResultFile

description: A zxAnOtdrPortTestFinished is sent when the agent has detected
that the OTDR port test finished.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 4) ? 'OTDR port test has failed due to $v2' : 'OTDR port test status : $v1'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrPortTestFinished ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfStatus i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfFailedReason i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfResultFile s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSource i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrTestType i 1 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSrcIpType i 0 ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSrcIp s EXAMPLE

description: The result status of OTDR fast test.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfStatus

description: The OTDR fast test failed reason.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfFailedReason

description: Fast test result file name.
NE returns file name such as '1-1-5-1-20120505143302.csv' when the
fast test sucess.
NE returns empty string when the fast test failed.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestIfResultFile

description: OTDR fast test request source.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSource

description: OTDR test type.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrTestType

description: IP address type of the OTDR fast test request source.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSrcIpType

description: IP address of the OTDR fast test request source.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrFastTestRequestSrcIp

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempAlm trap is sent when the current
control card temperature is higher than
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempHighThresh.

event.Summary: Current control card temperature ($v1) exceeded the threshold ($v2)

description: The current control card temperature of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp

description: The high threshold of the control card temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is higher than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is lower than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempHighThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempClr trap is sent when the current
control card temperature is lower than
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempHighThresh.

event.Summary: Current control card temperature ($v1) is normal

description: The current control card temperature of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp

description: The high threshold of the control card temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is higher than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardHighTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is lower than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempHighThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempAlm trap is sent when the current
control card temperature is lower than
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempLowThresh.

event.Summary: Current control card temperature ($v1) is lower than the threshold ($v2)

description: The current control card temperature of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp

description: The low threshold of the control card temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is lower than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is higher than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempLowThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempClr trap is sent when the current
control card temperature is higher than
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempLowThresh.

event.Summary: Current control card temperature ($v1) is normal

description: The current control card temperature of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp

description: The low threshold of the control card temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is lower than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvCtrlCardLowTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrCtrlCardCurrentTemp is higher than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrCtrlCardTempLowThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureAlm trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus is abnormal.
The fan status. When zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus
is abnormal, zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureAlm trap should be sent
to manager. If zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus is normal
zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureClr trap should be sent.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus

description: The operational status of fan.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvFanOperStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureClr trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus is normal.
The fan status. When zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus
is abnormal, zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureAlm trap should be sent
to manager. If zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus is normal
zxAnOtdrEnvFanFailureClr trap should be sent.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvFanStatus

description: The operational status of fan.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvFanOperStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempAlm trap is sent when the APD current
temperature is higher than zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempHighThresh.

event.Summary: APD current temperature ($v1) is higher than the threshold ($v2)

description: The current temperature of APD.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp

description: The high threshold of the APD temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is higher than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is lower than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempHighThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempClr trap is sent when the APD current
temperature is lower than zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempHighThresh.
The current temperature of APD.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp

description: The high threshold of the APD temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is higher than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvApdHighTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is lower than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempHighThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempAlm trap is sent when the APD current
temperature is lower than zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempLowThresh.

event.Summary: APD current temperature ($v1) is lower than the threshold ($v2)

description: The current temperature of APD.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp

description: The low threshold of the APD temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is lower than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp higher than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempLowThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempClr trap is sent when the APD current
temperature is higher than zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempLowThresh.
The current temperature of APD.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp

description: The low threshold of the APD temperature, the
zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempAlm trap should be generated when
zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp is lower than it.
Otherwise, zxAnOtdrEnvApdLowTempClr trap should be generated
when zxAnOtdrEnvApdCurrentTemp higher than it.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrEnvApdTempLowThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrPortUtilExceedAlm trap is sent when the current
port utilization is higher than zxAnOtdrPortUtilizationThresh.

event.Summary: Current port utilization ($v1) is higher than the threshold ($v2)

description: The current port utilization of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrPortUtilization

description: The threshold of zxAnOtdrPortUtilization.
When zxAnOtdrPortUtilization exceeds this threshold
the zxAnOtdrPortUtlExceedAlm trap should be generated.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrPortUtilizationThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrPortUtilExceedClr trap is sent when the current
port utilization is lower than zxAnOtdrPortUtilizationThresh.
The current port utilization of OTDR equipment.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrPortUtilization

description: The threshold of zxAnOtdrPortUtilization.
When zxAnOtdrPortUtilization exceeds this threshold
the zxAnOtdrPortUtlExceedAlm trap should be generated.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrPortUtilizationThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedAlm trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is opened.
OTDR monitoring node status.
A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is opened.
A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is closed.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedClr trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is closed.
OTDR monitoring node status.
A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is opened.
A zxAnOtdrMonNodeOpenedClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus is closed.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrMonNodeStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalAlm trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is abnormal.
OTDR monitoring port link status.
A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is abnormal.
A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is normal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalClr trap is sent when the
zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is normal.
OTDR monitoring port link status.
A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is abnormal.
A zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkAbnormalClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus is normal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrMonPortLinkStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrOptModuleAbnormalAlm is sent when the
zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus is abnormal.
The OTDR optical module status.
A zxAnOtdrOptModuleAbnormalAlm trap will be sent when the
zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus is abnormal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrOptModuleAbnormalClr is sent when the
zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus is normal.
The OTDR optical module status.
A zxAnOtdrOptModuleAbnormalAlm trap will be sent when the
zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus is abnormal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrOptPowerVaryExceedAlm trap is sent when the
difference value of zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr and
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr is higher than
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfPwrVaryThresh.

event.Summary: OTDR optical power vary threshold ($v3) exceeded

description: OTDR interface basic optical power.
'65535' means the basic optical power is invalid.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr

description: OTDR interface current optical power.
'65535' means the current optical power is invalid.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr

description: OTDR interface optical power variaton threshold.
A zxAnOtdrOptPowerVaryExceedAlm trap is sent when the difference
value of zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr and
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr is higher than this threshold.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfPwrVaryThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrOptPowerVaryExceedClr trap is sent when the
difference value of zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr and
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr is lower than
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfPwrVaryThresh.

event.Summary: OTDR optical power vary threshold alarm cleared

description: OTDR interface basic optical power.
'65535' means the basic optical power is invalid.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr

description: OTDR interface current optical power.
'65535' means the current optical power is invalid.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr

description: OTDR interface optical power variaton threshold.
A zxAnOtdrOptPowerVaryExceedAlm trap is sent when the difference
value of zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfBasicPwr and
zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfCurrentPwr is higher than this threshold.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrOptModuleIfPwrVaryThresh

description: A zxAnOtdrDetectionLineAbnAlm is sent when the
zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is peakAbnormal or brokenFiber.
OTDR detection line status.
A zxAnOtdrDetectionLineAbnAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is peakAbnormal or fiberBroken.
A zxAnOtdrDetectionLineAbnClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is normal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrDetectLineStatus

description: A zxAnOtdrDetectionAbnClr is sent when the
zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is normal.
OTDR detection line status.
A zxAnOtdrDetectionLineAbnAlm trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is peakAbnormal or fiberBroken.
A zxAnOtdrDetectionLineAbnClr trap will be sent when
the zxAnOtdrDetectionLineStatus is normal.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-OTDR-MIB::zxAnOtdrDetectLineStatus
